name: Cobots
storyline: What is the meaning of life? For these little robots it has always been to solve the problems their creator built for them. Their creator is however long gone, and is not providing them any problems to solve. What do they do then? They created their own problems in the form of puzzles! Use your wits to overcome these puzzles and help the robots find meaning in their lives once again!
summary: Manipulate time and cooperate with yourself to solve challenging puzzles! Delve into a colorful world filled with a variety of dangers and unique mind-bending puzzle mechanics.
